49981.<voice 00359_00049981><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00359_00049981><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Are you also going to Gran Zedora
Kingdom?<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49982.<voice 00365_00049982><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00365_00049982><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Phew. Sorry. Don't be so alarmed.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49983.<voice 00386_00049983><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00386_00049983><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>You may not know this.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49984.<voice 00416_00049984><start_lip_sync n0:
. Your name is known to a surprisingly large number of people. As the one who defeated the Netherlord
Nergel.

49985.<voice 00486_00049985><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00486_00049985><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>My name is Claws, and I'm traveling
the world in search of someone.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49986.<voice 00536_00049986><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00536_00049986><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>You were going to Bridge, weren't you?
I would like to join you.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49987.<voice 00992_00049987><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00992_00049987><start_lip_sync n02030 _normal m00001>Vice Captain Dudley!<stop_lip_animation n02030 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49988.<voice 01082_00049988><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01082_00049988><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>What a surprise. Our lifeline, Magic
Compass, has vanished.<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49990.<voice 01394_00049990><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01394_00049990><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>I apologize for the inconvenience. We
are in the process of taking in the
data.<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49991.<voice 01455_00049991><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01455_00049991><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>I see that Magic Compass is no longer
available.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49992.<voice 01495_00049992><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01495_00049992><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>No, no, no, I mean...<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49993.<voice 01535_00049993><start_lip_sync n0:
I could hear the commotion outside. Without the Magic Compass, we would not be able to cross the magical mist
and go to Lendersia, right?

49994.<voice 01570_00049994><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01570_00049994><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>Yes, I am sure that is correct. You
are right. But Captain Abram and many
other sailors are looking for him.<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49995.<voice 01670_00049995><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01670_00049995><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>I really have to go to Lendersia. I
have to do something.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49997.<voice 01923_00049997><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01923_00049997><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>I'm sorry to say, but I've got nothing
to show for it. I guess you can't
either, by the looks of it.<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50002.<voice 03157_00050002><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03157_00050002><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>Oh, yes! I never realized that I had
forgotten something so important!<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50003.<voice 03205_00050003><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03205_00050003><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>I had replaced Magic Compass with a
fake, just in case something like this
happened.<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50004.<voice 03239_00050004><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03239_00050004><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>The missing compass is a fake compass,
and the real Magic Compass is safe. I
apologize for the disturbance.<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50006.<voice 03439_00050006><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03439_00050006><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>The ship will reach Lendersia without
any problems. Now, everyone, back to
your posts!<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000816.<voice 03499_29000816><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03499_29000816><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>That's that guy, Claws or something.<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000817.<voice 03500_29000817><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03500_29000817><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>You did something.<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50008.<voice 03719_00050008><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03719_00050008><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>I didn't know there was a fake
compass. The captain is a very bad
person.<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50009.<voice 03954_00050009><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03954_00050009><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>What's up, Dudley? How's the search
going for Magic Compass?<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50010.<voice 04018_00050010><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04018_00050010><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>What? Didn't the captain just say that
the missing compass was a fake one and
the real one is safe?<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50011.<voice 04114_00050011><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04114_00050011><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>Stupid thing! What are you talking
about? I've never heard of a fake
compass!<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50012.<voice 04144_00050012><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04144_00050012><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>Forget about that. Let's split up and
search everywhere again! Hurry up!<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50014.<voice 04394_00050014><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04394_00050014><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>The captain has misremembered a few
things. I know this kind of technique.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50015.<voice 04424_00050015><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04424_00050015><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>But more importantly, you remember the
red-haired sailor who first left the
bridge? Follow him.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74714.<voice 04444_00074714><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04444_00074714><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Probably headed for the first floor
deck. I'll be heading there soon.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50016.<voice 00111_00050016><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00111_00050016><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>Dear Sir or Madam, I apologize. I
apologize for the very unsightly
appearance I made earlier.<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50017.<voice 00183_00050017><start_lip_sync n0:
The ship is approaching the waters where the magical mist will soon be visible, but unfortunately the Magic
Compass has not yet been found.

50018.<voice 00223_00050018><start_lip_sync n0:
The bridge was open to all, but there were always at least two crew members present, and there were no reports of
anyone suspicious.

50019.<voice 00263_00050019><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00263_00050019><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>I looked up and saw that Magic Compass
had vanished like smoke. I had no idea
what had happened.<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50020.<voice 00310_00050020><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00310_00050020><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>But if we don't, we'll have to go back
to Lendor Island. We have to find it!<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50021.<voice 00370_00050021><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00370_00050021><start_lip_sync n02031 _normal m00001>You think this is a fake? No way. It
can't be.<stop_lip_animation n02031 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50022.<voice 00625_00050022><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00625_00050022><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>You're as good as I'd expect you to
get there first. <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50023.<voice 00775_00050023><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00775_00050023><start_lip_sync n02031 _normal m00001>Oh, you guys saw that, didn't you?<stop_lip_animation n02031 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50024.<voice 00820_00050024><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00820_00050024><start_lip_sync n02031 _normal m00001>I'm getting a little crazy now that
they're giving me a fake compass.<stop_lip_animation n02031 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50025.<voice 00875_00050025><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00875_00050025><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>No, there is no such thing. There was
no such thing as a fake compass from
the beginning.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50028.<voice 01085_00050028><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01085_00050028><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>We must cross over to Lendersia.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50029.<voice 01150_00050029><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01150_00050029><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>I'm going to ask you to return that
real compass.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50030.<voice 01236_00050030><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01236_00050030><start_lip_sync n02031 _normal m00001>Damn you! How dare you cheat me!<stop_lip_animation n02031 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50031.<voice 01323_00050031><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01323_00050031><start_lip_sync n02031 _normal m00001>I'll never let you go to Lendersia!
I'll do this to Magic Compass!<stop_lip_animation n02031 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50032.<voice 01413_00050032><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01413_00050032><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>It is useless to throw them away.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50033.<voice 01480_00050033><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01480_00050033><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Even if you sink to the bottom of the
sea, I will easily find you.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50034.<voice 01595_00050034><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01595_00050034><start_lip_sync n02031 _normal m00001>Damn! How far you'll go!<stop_lip_animation n02031 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50036.<voice 01820_00050036><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01820_00050036><start_lip_sync n02031 _normal m00001>I was told not to make a fuss, but I
had no choice.<stop_lip_animation n02031 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50037.<voice 02195_00050037><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 02195_00050037><start_lip_sync m13800 _normal m00001>I am Mavok, a messenger of Netherlord
Nergel!<stop_lip_animation m13800 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50038.<voice 02320_00050038><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 02320_00050038><start_lip_sync m13800 _normal m00001>By the will of the Lord Netherlord, no
one will ever set foot on the land of
Lendersia!<stop_lip_animation m13800 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50039.<voice 02645_00050039><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02645_00050039><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>I am in a hurry.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50041.<voice 03860_00050041><start_lip_sync n0:
Even after his death, Netherlord Nergel ordered his men to prevent anyone from crossing over to
Lendersia.

50042.<voice 03925_00050042><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03925_00050042><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>What the hell is going on?<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50044.<voice 04320_00050044><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 04320_00050044><start_lip_sync m13800 _normal m00001>Woe to those who tread on the land of
Le Lendersia!<stop_lip_animation m13800 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50045.<voice 05418_00050045><start_lip_sync n0:
I'm glad I didn't get dumped in the ocean. I didn't want to be dumped into the ocean. I almost had
jump into the ocean.

50046.<voice 05678_00050046><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 05678_00050046><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>The Magic Compass we have been seeking
and searching for has finally returned
to our hands.<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50047.<voice 05763_00050047><start_lip_sync n0:
Thank you for your cooperation! The ship will soon enter the magical mist. You and your crew will be safe on
board!

50048.<voice 06158_00050048><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 06158_00050048><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>This should get us to Lendersia,
although it will be a while before we
get there.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50049.<voice 06263_00050049><start_lip_sync n0:
If you have nothing to do on board, just ask the guest room attendant and they will let you rest in your room
until you get to port.

50050.<voice 06273_00050050><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 06273_00050050><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>He's the one at the counter on the
first floor. Please remember me.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50052.<voice 00171_00050052><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00171_00050052><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Are you about to take a vacation too?<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50053.<voice 00340_00050053><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00340_00050053><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>This is for our guests on board.<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50054.<voice 00370_00050054><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00370_00050054><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>The ship will now enter the magical

50055.<voice 00690_00050055><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00690_00050055><start_lip_sync n02029 _normal m00001>It's no good! All the gauges are not

50056.<voice 00790_00050056><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00790_00050056><start_lip_sync n02030 _normal m00001>This one, too! The steering is not

50057.<voice 00900_00050057><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00900_00050057><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>Is this the power of magical mist?<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50058.<voice 00970_00050058><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00970_00050058><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>Please, Magic Compass! Magic Compass,

50059.<voice 01810_00050059><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01810_00050059><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>I'm sorry, no.<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50060.<voice 02572_00050060><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02572_00050060><start_lip_sync n02030 _normal m00001>Captain! The rudder! The rudder is

50061.<voice 02727_00050061><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02727_00050061><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>All right! Take the path in the

50062.<voice 03182_00050062><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03182_00050062><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>It appears things have calmed down.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50063.<voice 03288_00050063><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03288_00050063><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>I'll leave the rest to the sailors,

50172.<voice 03818_00050172><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03818_00050172><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>Why can't I reach Gran Zedora Kingdom?<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50065.<voice 03987_00050065><start_lip_sync n0:
The magical mist is safely out, but the current is so strong that there is no way to get close to the waters of
Gran Zedora.

50066.<voice 04182_00050066><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04182_00050066><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>There is nothing we can do. The

50067.<voice 04248_00050067><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04248_00050067><start_lip_sync n02027 _normal m00001>The ship will dock here! It is with

overland to Gran Zedora Kingdom.<stop_lip_animation n02027 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50068.<voice 04707_00050068><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04707_00050068><start_lip_sync n02028 _normal m00001>We are pleased to inform you that the

vessel has arrived at Lendersia.<stop_lip_animation n02028 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50069.<voice 04978_00050069><start_lip_sync n0:
Although our destination is not the port of Gran Zedora Kingdom, we have decided to anchor at Lendersia as our

50070.<voice 05053_00050070><start_lip_sync n0:
